title: ADHD
description: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) affects attention, impulsivity, and self-control.

title: Depression
description: A mood disorder causing persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest.

title: Bipolar Disorder
description: A mental condition marked by alternating periods of elation and depression.

title: PTSD
description: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder occurs after experiencing or witnessing traumatic events.

title: Schizophrenia
description: A severe disorder affecting thinking, emotions, and behavior.

title: Anxiety
description: Anxiety disorders involve excessive fear, worry, or nervousness.

title: Eating Disorder
description: Conditions like anorexia or bulimia that affect eating behaviors and health.

title: Paranoia
description: Paranoia is an irrational distrust or suspicion of others.
